title: I dont get any chests when my premade get S rank.
body:
I still have 4 chests slots.( didnt earn any in a while )
We play ranked
I have champions they play
My premades get S rank.

Never got any chests.

WHY

replies.body:
You can only get one chest per champion per season, so if you are playing a champion with whom you have already earned a chest, you cannot earn another chest on that champion until next season.

Also, if your premade friend gets an S grade, the chest you get counts for the champion that you are playing, not the one they are playing. This means that if you are playing a champion with whom you already earned a chest and someone in your premade gets an S grade with a different champion, you will still not get a chest.
